title: US Returns To Iran Latest Batch Of Over 1,000 Ancient Clay Tablets: Report
content: The United States has returned to Iran more than 1,000 clay tablets dating from the Achaemenid-era, official media said, reporting the sixth such handover of its kind.
summary: The United States has returned to Iran more than 1,000 clay tablets dating from the Achaemenid-era, official media said, reporting the sixth such handover of its kind.

title: Thai Woman, 30, Dies After Manager Rejects Sick Leave Request
content: A 30-year-old factory worker in Thailand collapsed and died a day after her manager allegedly refused her sick leave request.
summary: A 30-year-old factory worker in Thailand collapsed and died a day after her manager allegedly refused her sick leave request.

title: "Stop Viewing Women...": French Rape Trial Sparks Debate About Masculinity
content: The trial of a man who drugged his wife to have her raped by dozens of strangers for almost a decade has ignited a quiet discussion around masculinity in France.
summary: The trial of a man who drugged his wife to have her raped by dozens of strangers for almost a decade has ignited a quiet discussion around masculinity in France.

title: Israel To Continue Ceasefire Discussions For Lebanon, Says Netanyahu
content: Israel will continue to discuss ceasefire proposals for Lebanon in the days ahead, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Friday, as Washington warned that further escalation would only make it harder for civilians on both sides to return home.
summary: Israel will continue to discuss ceasefire proposals for Lebanon in the days ahead, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Friday, as Washington warned that further escalation would only make it harder for civilians on both sides to return home.

title: Shigeru Ishiba: Political Troublemaker Set To Take Charge As Japan's New PM
content: Japan's next prime minister, Shigeru Ishiba, says he reads three books a day and would rather do that than mingle with the ruling party colleagues who picked him as their new leader today
summary: Japan's next prime minister, Shigeru Ishiba, says he reads three books a day and would rather do that than mingle with the ruling party colleagues who picked him as their new leader today

title: Japan's Ex-Defence Minister Shigeru Ishiba Set To Become PM Next Week
content: Former defence minister Shigeru Ishiba will become Japan's prime minister next week after winning the conservative ruling party's leadership vote on Friday.
summary: Former defence minister Shigeru Ishiba will become Japan's prime minister next week after winning the conservative ruling party's leadership vote on Friday.

title: After Covid, How Are Scientists Prepping For Potential Pandemic "Disease X"
content: Before the COVID pandemic, the World Health Organization (WHO) had made a list of priority infectious diseases. These were felt to pose a threat to international public health.
summary: Before the COVID pandemic, the World Health Organization (WHO) had made a list of priority infectious diseases. These were felt to pose a threat to international public health.

title: Vladimir Putin Rachets Up Nuclear Rhetoric, But Is He Ready To Act?
content: Vladimir Putin's proposed revision of Russian nuclear policy signals a worrying readiness to use the ultimate weapon against Ukraine and even NATO members, but it remains far from certain the threat will be translated into action, analysts say.
summary: Vladimir Putin's proposed revision of Russian nuclear policy signals a worrying readiness to use the ultimate weapon against Ukraine and even NATO members, but it remains far from certain the threat will be translated into action, analysts say.

title: This Spanish Mother-Daughter Duo Train Bacteria To Restore Church Frescoes
content: As Spanish microbiologist Pilar Bosch was casting around for a subject to investigate for her PhD in 2008, she stumbled across a paper suggesting that bacteria, her field, could be used in art restoration, her mother's own area of expertise.
summary: As Spanish microbiologist Pilar Bosch was casting around for a subject to investigate for her PhD in 2008, she stumbled across a paper suggesting that bacteria, her field, could be used in art restoration, her mother's own area of expertise.

title: Internet Stunned By Giant, Crocodile-Like Fish In Viral Video
content: A group of fishermen in Canada caught what appeared to be a giant crocodile-like fish slowly moving under the calm waters.
summary: A group of fishermen in Canada caught what appeared to be a giant crocodile-like fish slowly moving under the calm waters.

title: "This Is Not Normal": Melania Trump Recalls Ex-President's Assassination Bid
content: Former US first lady Melania Trump recalled learning that her husband had been bloodied by a would-be assassin's bullet, describing his near-miss as "a miracle" in a rare interview aired Thursday.
summary: Former US first lady Melania Trump recalled learning that her husband had been bloodied by a would-be assassin's bullet, describing his near-miss as "a miracle" in a rare interview aired Thursday.

title: Lebanon Ceasefire Confusion Tests US Approach To Israel, Again
content: The US and its allies shared a brief moment of optimism on Wednesday as they unveiled a three-week ceasefire proposal to halt the violence between Israel and Hezbollah.
summary: The US and its allies shared a brief moment of optimism on Wednesday as they unveiled a three-week ceasefire proposal to halt the violence between Israel and Hezbollah.

title: Why Jennifer Lawrence Is Backing Harris As President  After Taylor Swift
content: Oscar-winning actress Jennifer Lawrence has officially endorsed Kamala Harris for the 2024 US presidential election, citing the urgent need to safeguard abortion rights as a key reason for her decision.
summary: Oscar-winning actress Jennifer Lawrence has officially endorsed Kamala Harris for the 2024 US presidential election, citing the urgent need to safeguard abortion rights as a key reason for her decision.

title: China On "High Alert" After Japan Warship Sails Through Taiwan Strait
content: China's military was on "high alert" Thursday and Beijing said it had lodged a complaint with Tokyo after a Japanese warship sailed through the Taiwan Strait for the first time.
summary: China's military was on "high alert" Thursday and Beijing said it had lodged a complaint with Tokyo after a Japanese warship sailed through the Taiwan Strait for the first time.

title: Another US Inmate To Be Executed By Nitrogen Gas
content: A man was put to death by lethal injection Thursday in the US state of Oklahoma, officials said, while Alabama was scheduled to carry out an execution with nitrogen gas, the second such execution in the country.
summary: A man was put to death by lethal injection Thursday in the US state of Oklahoma, officials said, while Alabama was scheduled to carry out an execution with nitrogen gas, the second such execution in the country.

title: Chinese Nuclear Submarine Sinks In Major Embarrassment For Beijing: Report
content: China's newest nuclear-powered attack submarine sank earlier this year, a senior US defence official said on Thursday, a potential embarrassment for Beijing as it seeks to expand its military capabilities.
summary: China's newest nuclear-powered attack submarine sank earlier this year, a senior US defence official said on Thursday, a potential embarrassment for Beijing as it seeks to expand its military capabilities.

title: After 100-Year Hypothesis, Scientists Find Cells That Could Heal Wounds
content: These cells can transform into endothelial cells and macrophages, aiding in blood vessel growth and tissue repair, particularly when triggered by injury or poor blood flow.
summary: These cells can transform into endothelial cells and macrophages, aiding in blood vessel growth and tissue repair, particularly when triggered by injury or poor blood flow.

title: Robert Kennedy Jr "Grabbed" Reporter's Hand Before Scandal: Report
content: Olivia Nuzzi recently admitted to her editors that she was engaged in a relationship with former US presidential candidate Robert F Kennedy Jr.
summary: Olivia Nuzzi recently admitted to her editors that she was engaged in a relationship with former US presidential candidate Robert F Kennedy Jr.

title: US Mom Finds Son Sweaty, Discovers Body In His Vehicle. Then This Happens
content: "What have you done?" A mother's haunting question pierced the air after she discovered a human foot near their family van in Texas, US.
summary: "What have you done?" A mother's haunting question pierced the air after she discovered a human foot near their family van in Texas, US.

title: Hurricane Helene Makes Landfall In Florida
content: The "extremely dangerous" Hurricane Helene made landfall in the US state of Florida on Thursday, with officials warning of "unsurvivable" conditions and a potentially catastrophic storm surge high enough to swamp a two-story house.
summary: The "extremely dangerous" Hurricane Helene made landfall in the US state of Florida on Thursday, with officials warning of "unsurvivable" conditions and a potentially catastrophic storm surge high enough to swamp a two-story house.
